name: Office Horror Story - Arrival of the Chainsaw Killer
name_original: Office Horror Story - Arrival of the Chainsaw Killer
description:
Office Horror Story - Arrival of the Chainsaw Killer

Office Horror Story is a FPS game similar to Slenderman or Jeff The Killer, but with the twist.

Explore Office, Stairs and Basement.

Find out the horrifying story about Chainsaw Killer.

- Scary as Slenderman but not another Slenderman alike!

- 16 levels to play

- 2 melee weapons

- Puzzles to solve and objects to find.

- If you like Silent Hill or Resident Evil games, this one is for you.
